  9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_CORR_HPP
 10#define VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_CORR_HPP
 11
 12/***********************************************************************
 13  Included Files
 14***********************************************************************/
 15
 16#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 17#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/vector.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
 20#include <vsip/core/signal/types.hpp>
 21#include <vsip/core/profile.hpp>
 22#include <vsip/core/signal/corr_common.hpp>
 23#if !VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 24# include <vsip/opt/signal/corr_ext.hpp>
 25# include <vsip/opt/signal/corr_opt.hpp>

 27#  include <vsip/opt/cbe/cml/corr.hpp>
 28# endif
 29#endif

 31# include <vsip/core/cvsip/corr.hpp>

 34/***********************************************************************
 35  Declarations
 36***********************************************************************/
 37
 38#if !VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 39
 40namespace vsip_csl
 41{
 42namespace dispatcher
 43{
 44template <dimension_type D,
 45          support_region_type R,
 46          typename T,
 47          unsigned int N,
 48          alg_hint_type H>
 49struct List<op::corr<D, R, T, N, H> >
 50{
 51  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 52			 be::cml,
 53			 be::opt,
 54			 be::cvsip,
 55			 be::generic>::type type;
 56};
 57
 58} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
 59} // namespace vsip_csl
 60
 61#endif
 62
 63namespace vsip
 64{
 65
 66template <template <typename, typename> class ConstViewT,
 67	  support_region_type                 Supp,
 68	  typename                            T = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 69	  unsigned                            N_times = 0,
 70          alg_hint_type                       A_hint = alg_time>
 71class Correlation
 72  : public impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal>,
 73#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 74    public impl::cvsip::Correlation<impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
 75                                    Supp, T, N_times, A_hint>
 76#else
 77    public vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
 78      vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::corr<impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
 79                                        Supp,
 80                                        T,
 81                                        N_times,
 82                                        A_hint> >::type
 83#endif
 84{
 85  // Implementation compile-time constants.
 86private: 
 87  static dimension_type const dim = impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim;
 88
 89  typedef impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal> accumulator_type;
 90
 91#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 92  typedef impl::cvsip::Correlation<dim, Supp, T, N_times, A_hint> base_type;
 93#else
 94  typedef typename 
 95  vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
 96    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::corr<dim, Supp, T, N_times, A_hint> >::type base_type;
 97#endif
 98
 99public:
100  Correlation(Domain<dim> const&   ref_size,
101	      Domain<dim> const&   input_size)
102    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
103      : accumulator_type(impl::signal_detail::Description<dim, T>::tag
104                         ("Correlation",
105                          impl::extent(input_size), impl::extent(ref_size)),
106                         impl::signal_detail::Op_count_corr<dim, T>::value
107                         (impl::extent(input_size), impl::extent(ref_size))),
108        base_type(ref_size, input_size)
109  {}
110
111  Correlation(Correlation const& corr) VSIP_NOTHROW;
112  Correlation& operator=(Correlation const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
113  ~Correlation() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
114
115
116  // Accessors
117public:
118  support_region_type support() const VSIP_NOTHROW     { return Supp; }
119
120
121  // Correlation operators.
122public:
123  template <typename Block0,
124	    typename Block1,
125	    typename Block2>
126  Vector<T, Block2>
127  operator()(
128    bias_type               bias,
129    const_Vector<T, Block0> ref,
130    const_Vector<T, Block1> in,
131    Vector<T, Block2>       out)
132    VSIP_NOTHROW
133  {
134    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
135
136    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
137    {
138      assert(ref.size(d) == this->reference_size()[d].size());
139      assert(in.size(d)  == this->input_size()[d].size());
140      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
141    }
142
143    impl_correlate(bias, ref, in, out);
144
145    return out;
146  }
147
148  template <typename Block0,
149	    typename Block1,
150	    typename Block2>
151  Matrix<T, Block2>
152  operator()(
153    bias_type               bias,
154    const_Matrix<T, Block0> ref,
155    const_Matrix<T, Block1> in,
156    Matrix<T, Block2>       out)
157    VSIP_NOTHROW
158  {
159    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
160
161    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
162    {
163      assert(ref.size(d) == this->reference_size()[d].size());
164      assert(in.size(d)  == this->input_size()[d].size());
165      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
166    }
167
168    impl_correlate(bias, ref, in, out);
169
170    return out;
171  }
172
173  float impl_performance(char* what) const
174  {
175    if      (!strcmp(what, "mops"))  return this->mflops();
176    else if (!strcmp(what, "time"))  return this->total();
177    else if (!strcmp(what, "count")) return this->count();
178    else return this->base_type::impl_performance(what);
179  }
180};
181
182} // namespace vsip
183
184#endif // VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_CORR_HPP
